text: [Ej pajomʙar] Agar [dar ʙorai islom va tavhid] ʙo tu mucodala kardand, ʙigu: "Man dar ʙaroʙari Alloh taolo [va avomiru ahkomas] taslim sudaam va pajravonam [niz cunin hastand]"; va ʙa ahli kitoʙ [jahudijon va masehijon] va musrikon ʙigu: "Ojo sumo ham taslim sudaed"? Agar taslim savand, hatman hidojat joftaand va agar rujgardon sudand [va sarpeci kardand, ƣamgin masav, zero] tu vazifae cuz rasondan [-i vahj] nadori; va Alloh taolo ʙa [ahvoli] ʙandagon ʙinost
